name: React Native Conference 2026
description: Join us for the biggest React Native conference of the year! Learn about the latest developments in React Native, meet industry leaders, and network with fellow developers from around the world. This year's conference features workshops, keynotes, and hands-on sessions covering performance optimization, best practices, and cutting-edge features.

name: Tech Innovation Summit
description: Explore the future of technology at this groundbreaking summit. Featuring AI innovations, blockchain technology, and the next generation of mobile applications. Network with CTOs, developers, and investors shaping the future of tech.

name: Mobile App Dev Meetup
description: Monthly meetup for mobile app developers. This month we're focusing on cross-platform development strategies, state management patterns, and performance optimization techniques. Pizza and drinks provided!

name: Design Systems Workshop
description: Learn how to build scalable and maintainable design systems for mobile applications. This hands-on workshop covers component libraries, theming, accessibility, and design tokens. Perfect for developers and designers working on mobile apps.

name: JavaScript & Coffee
description: Start your day with coffee and code! Join fellow JavaScript enthusiasts for casual networking and knowledge sharing. Topics range from vanilla JS to modern frameworks. All skill levels welcome.

name: Mobile Security Conference
description: Comprehensive conference on mobile application security. Learn about secure coding practices, encryption, authentication, and protecting user data. Essential for developers building production mobile apps.

name: TypeScript Deep Dive
description: Advanced TypeScript workshop covering generics, utility types, decorators, and advanced patterns. Learn how to leverage TypeScript's type system to build more reliable mobile applications.

name: Startup Showcase 2026
description: Watch innovative startups pitch their mobile-first products. Network with founders, investors, and early adopters. Great opportunity for developers looking to join exciting early-stage companies.

name: Open Source Contributors Day
description: Contribute to popular open source mobile projects! Maintainers will be on hand to help new contributors get started. Whether you're fixing bugs, improving docs, or adding features, everyone is welcome.

name: Performance Optimization Masterclass
description: Master the art of mobile app performance optimization. Topics include bundle size reduction, memory management, rendering performance, and profiling tools. Bring your slow app and leave with a fast one!

name: Women in Tech Summit
description: Celebrating and empowering women in technology. Featuring inspiring speakers, mentorship sessions, and networking opportunities. Join us in building a more inclusive tech community.

name: GraphQL for Mobile Apps
description: Learn how to use GraphQL in your mobile applications. Topics include Apollo Client, caching strategies, offline support, and optimistic UI updates. Transform how your apps communicate with backends.
